name: Red Double-Decker Bus
description: Experience the thrill of a classic red double-decker bus with this beautifully designed toy. Perfect for imaginative play and great for collectors.

name: Monster Truck
description: Unleash the power of the monster truck! This rugged and powerful toy will conquer any obstacle in its way. Great for outdoor adventures and high-speed excitement.

name: Sports Car
description: Feel the adrenaline rush with this sleek sports car. Its aerodynamic design and powerful engine make it the perfect toy for racing enthusiasts. Get ready to speed away!

name: Yellow School Bus
description: All aboard the yellow school bus! This toy captures the charm of a traditional school bus and provides endless fun for little ones. Great for pretend play and educational activities.

name: Fire Truck
description: Sound the alarm! This fire truck toy is equipped with all the essentials to fight pretend fires and save the day. Inspire young heroes with this realistic and engaging playset.

name: Race Car Set
description: Experience the excitement of racing with this thrilling race car set. Includes two high-speed cars and a customizable track for hours of competitive fun.

name: City Tour Bus
description: Take a tour around the city with this detailed and realistic city bus toy. Perfect for role-playing scenarios and exploring different places.

name: Construction Truck Set
description: Let your child's imagination run wild with this construction truck set. Includes various trucks and accessories to create a mini construction site.
